name: List All Books Currently Issued
query:
SELECT 
    lt.name AS transaction_id,
    m.full_name AS member_name,
    a.name AS book_title,
    lt.date AS issue_date
FROM 
    `tabLibrary Transaction` lt
JOIN 
    `tabLibrary Member` m ON lt.library_member = m.name
JOIN 
    `tabArticle` a ON lt.article = a.article_name
WHERE 
    lt.type = 'Issue'
GROUP BY
    a.name
